001package io.cyborgcode.roa.framework.parameters;
002
003import io.cyborgcode.roa.framework.quest.SuperQuest;
004import java.util.function.BiConsumer;
005
006/**
007 * Defines a contract for pre-test setup operations that need to be executed before a test method runs.
008 *
009 * <p>Implementations of this interface should define specific preconditions that must be fulfilled
010 * before the test begins. These preconditions are executed as part of the {@code @PreQuest} setup
011 * and typically involve initializing test data or configuring the test environment dynamically.
012 *
013 * <p>Each implementation is expected to define a unique execution logic that is invoked through
014 * the {@link #journey()} method, which accepts the {@code SuperQuest} instance and additional parameters.
015 *
016 * @author Cyborg Code Syndicate üíçüë®üíª
017 */
018public interface PreQuestJourney<T extends Enum<T>> {
019
020   /**
021    * Defines the precondition execution logic.
022    *
023    * <p>This method accepts a {@link SuperQuest} instance and an array of objects representing
024    * dynamic parameters required for precondition execution. The implementation should
025    * process these inputs accordingly and modify the test state as needed.
026    *
027    * @return A {@link BiConsumer} that takes a {@link SuperQuest} instance and an array of parameters.
028    */
029   BiConsumer<SuperQuest, Object[]> journey();
030
031   /**
032    * Returns the enumeration representation of the implementing precondition.
033    *
034    * <p>Each implementation should provide an enum representation to facilitate
035    * easy lookup and execution of preconditions.
036    *
037    * @return An {@code Enum} representing the current precondition implementation.
038    */
039   T enumImpl();
040
041}
